name: Sertexos
tagline: Very Simple operating system for ComputerCraft
body:
### Welcome to SertexOS site SertexOS is a simple no-touch operating system for ComputerCraft 1.63 - 1.64 ### Features Password system crypted by SHA256
LuaIDE for dev
Ice-Browser for exploring files
SertexGPS if you lost your house you can try SertexGPS ### How to install To install SertexOS

run "pastebin run 31AUQX7g" without quotes

Warning: You need advanced computer to run SertexOS ### Authors and Contributors @Ale2610 Founder
@MultHub Dev
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
